TopicTitle: Does anyone have experience with modded planets in DMP?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

A friend and I want to keep DMP interesting so we turned to mods, now we want to mod the solar system with a planet pack or something, but we can't figure out if it's possible and if so how. So does anyone have any expirience with this and can give us a hand with it?

Greetings,

viccie211

Hello, my DMP alarm was set off

So long as every player has the same planets installed (This can be enforced with DMPModControl.txt on the server), then it should Just Work , as DMP references planet by the actual name.

I believe I've made DMP skip updates from missing planets, unsure what the full updates do though...
So how should I add that in the mod control? I only know how to add ship parts there, or am I missing something?
It will likely work without doing anything special in the mod control, but if you want to you can force the players to have the planet installed by specifying the files in the required section
Thanks By the way I love your work on DMP, it's great to play with friends
